iterations.text: Task 1.2: User Model & Devise Setup - Install Devise and create the User model. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.3: Credential Model - Create the Credential model migration and class. Configure ActiveRecord::Encryption for the api_key field. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.4: Repository Model - Create the Repository model and migration, including the foreign key for github_credential. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.5: Epic Model - Create the Epic model and migration. Add enums for status. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.6: Task Model - Create the Task model and migration. Add enums for status and position for ordering. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.7: NotificationChannel Model - Create the NotificationChannel model and migration. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
Task 1.8: AVO Admin Setup - Install AVO and create basic resources for all new models. Reference: @implementation-tasks.md
